SurveyVersionAddlInfo.name: SurveyVersionAddlInfo
SurveyVersionAddlInfo.description: Represents additional information about a survey version. This information defines the default settings of a survey version.

EmailSender.description: The organization-wide email address used to send a survey invitation.

EmailTemplateId.description: ID of the email template that's used to send an automated survey invitation.

EngagementContextMetadata.description: The custom metadata created to get the engagement context from the participants.

InvitationSharingRole.description: Indicates the users that share edit access to a survey invitation.

Language.description: Language used to create the survey.

SurveyQuestionId.description: ID of the survey question embedded in the email template used to send automated survey invitations.

SurveyVersionId.description: ID of the survey version. This field is unique within your organization
